name: HeLLin
description:
HeLLin

Wave-based pixel-art shooter game made by me and my 2 friends just for fun. This is our first completed game, and i really like it.  It's final version, it may contain bugs, stupid AI, etc. but we are at the very beginning in this gamedev journey, so please understand it :) 

P.S Sorry, for my veeery bad English, it's not my main language :)

Authors:

Bartłomiej J. (programmer)

Wiktor K. (artist)

Marcel B. (artist)
